text: Julie Bennett (January 24, 1932 â€“ March 31, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Manhattan. She is best known as the voice of Hanna-Barbera's Cindy Bear on The Yogi Bear Show and its feature-movie spin-off, Hey There, It's Yogi Bear!. Bennett also voiced Aunt May Parker in the Fox Kids animated TV series Spider-Man after Linda Gary's death in 1995.Behind the Voice Actors: Aunt May - Spider-Man (1994) Behind the Voice Actors, Retrieved April 2, 2020 Bennett died of problems caused by COVID-19 at the age of 88 on March 31, 2020 in Los Angeles.Julie Bennett, 'Yogi Bear' Voice Actress, Dies From Coronavirus Complications at 88.
